website_summaries.verdict: Choose this flea and tick collar if you don't want to use one with chemicals and don't mind the tradeoff: results that may be less reliable.
pros: Doesn't use pesticides or chemicals to control pests
Is formulated with natural essential oils known to deter fleas and ticks, including peppermint, citronella, and clove
Can last up for up to five months
cons: On the higher end of the price scale, and it's not as effective as others we considered when it comes to controlling some flea and tick infestations

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this collar
customer_reviews.text: I read alot of the reviews on this flea collar before buying it and I am very pleased with it my dog is 14 years old so I am very careful on what I put on her . She has been doing great with this collar no irration no marks I'm very pleased with this collar.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Takac

customer_reviews.title: Great Tick & Flea Collar
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I ordered two, one for my Doberman and one for my Pomsky. I love the scent!! Have not seen one tick on either of them!! I haven't had fleas at my house in many years and remain hopeful that I will not have any with this collar.. They work great and are all natural active ingredients... I feel better about using these natural collars. I will continue to buy this brand knowing they are safe for my dogs!!
customer_reviews.author: NancyB

customer_reviews.title: Natural Flea and Tick deterrent that works
customer_reviews.text: Works well as a flea and tick deterrent. It won’t kill them like the 8 month flea and tick killing collar which also caused one of my dogs to develop neurotoxicity leading to his death. As a retired RN, I now question the safety, of flea and tick killing products, for humans.
customer_reviews.author: L. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Does the job 100%!
customer_reviews.text: Does the job perfectly! I heard from my vet that nothing works 100% and that fleas and ticks get used to treatments, but this one worked as it was supposed to. I even visited my father and found fleas on his dogs, but my poodle didn’t catch them. Our vet doesn’t sell Arava but he said that if it works for us we should keep using it. Especially because it is natural and safe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so I was happy to find out that there is a natural solution ...
customer_reviews.text: As a biologist I know what the materials in other products can do to your dog (not mentioning that my children are exposed to it), so I was happy to find out that there is a natural solution to the ticks and fleas. It works 100%, and I recommended all my friends as well. I think we should all support more natural solutions like that.
customer_reviews.author: deanTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: All natural rssential oils, no harmful chemichals.
customer_reviews.text: I like this collar. It came fast, it is adjustable and has a pleasant smell that my sensitive bichon frise does not mind at all. Since we put it on we have not seen ticks on him. Previously we used spot on treatment that only worked for him, but he was the vector of bringing ticks inside for us. I hope this collar's repelling effects will last all summer.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela

customer_reviews.title: Natural vs Poison
customer_reviews.text: So happy to find product that is not toxic to my animals or myself and that does not smear off on my furniture. There is one small down side as they have a pungent citronella odor for the first couple of weeks. Again, delighted to put up with citronella aroma vs toxic chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Reba

customer_reviews.title: A natural product
customer_reviews.text: I love that I do not have to put poison on my dog to control peats. Granted she is at low risk but it is worth the peace of mind to me. This is the third collor I have gotten her and will continue with this product. My dog sitter was so impressed she investigated finding a more natural product to protect her cats.
customer_reviews.author: Michele D DuVall

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful chemical free dog collar
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product as well as their eye wipes- all herbal, healthy for your dog as well as you! Have 3 dogs and all three wear the collars. No FLEAS! No TICKS! And no worries when you or your child is hugging your dog. No chemicals that last and could cause I’ll effects to you long range.
customer_reviews.author: D cook

customer_reviews.title: Save my border collie from the evil fleas
customer_reviews.text: Fleas were in love with my border collie. I’m ashamed of all the chemicals I’ve used on her to eliminate the fleas, which only worked for a week or two. I tried this collar as a shot in the dark. It truly helped! Been using it for several months. My baby girl finally has some relief. I will buy new collars for all my dogs next spring. The only negative is my other dogs can pull this collar off of her when they play. I fixed with some duct tape.
customer_reviews.author: Karen E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: A natural flea collar that works!
customer_reviews.text: When I first took the collar out of the packaging, I was a bit put off because of the smell. It was not disagreeable, just really strong. Within a couple days, it improved greatly. As both my dog and I have sensitive skin issues, I was very pleased to find that we did not react to the product! Lol but the fleas sure did! If one did jump on him, it did not stay long. He is a little dog and being so close to the ground seems to invite the fleas. I am very pleased with this natural flea collar and would recommend others try it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob R

customer_reviews.title: Safe alternative
customer_reviews.text: I was a little reluctant at first to try this all natural flea and tick collar. Living in the woods it has been a battle to keep ticks off my dogs. Using chemicals was not an option. My dogs and I are very happy we tried this product....4 1/2 months....no ticks.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: I love safe products for my pets...
customer_reviews.text: The shipping was quick, the seller is nice and I am quite happy with the product. I enjoy knowing that my dog is being protected in a safe fashion. The smell is strong the first couple of days and after that I don't notice it. I actually like the smell and use a similar product on my cat who allows me to apply it without to much fuss. I will continue to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: L. Crane

customer_reviews.title: The Arava flea and tick botanical collar is great. It has a great smell to it and ...
customer_reviews.text: The Arava flea and tick botanical collar is great. It has a great smell to it and I love the fact that it is natural and chemical free. My dogs are like family and I would never want to use a collar that would harm them. The collar also fits great and feels really durable. I would recommend it for any pet lovers.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Kent

customer_reviews.title: No Chemicals for our Furbaby
customer_reviews.text: Excellent chemical-free solution! Our newly adopted pit bull has sensitive skin, and this is the perfect flea and tick collar. I do not worry that she is being exposed to harmful chemicals, and there is a pleasant 'botanical' fragrance too! Have not found any ticks on her and we live in the woods, and no fleas! So far, so good - so it is working AND safe for her to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best all natural collar out there!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this collar! This is my second order, and I will continue to purchase this for my dog. I always try to do everything the all natural way for my dog, there’s so many products out there that are just down right toxic for pets. This collar has the most essential oils I’ve seen in a collar and I love how you can adjust It to get the perfect fit, and the snap closure is great too. Best of all, my dog is flea and tick free!
customer_reviews.author: cyndi van heest

customer_reviews.title: Working so far and smells great!
customer_reviews.text: We use a tick and heartworm combo medicine that does not cover deer ticks or fleas. Bought this to augment that product. Have been using about 3 months and so far no ticks or fleas! All the natural ingredients make it smell very nice as well - much better than typical flea collars.
customer_reviews.author: Gem Girl

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE! SCAM SCAM SCAM
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this product I thought they would give me 5 collars for each month of protection. It is only one collar and it DOES NOT last for 5 months. It lasted a month. When you first open it the smell is so incredibly strong. My dog would be in the other room and I could still smell the ingredients. Would not purchase again for 30 bucks. They make a 10 dollar one at petsmart. I tried to reach out to the seller and got no response. PLEASE DO NOT VOTE THIS AS HELPFUL
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Good natural product
customer_reviews.text: It is a difficult product to review since I didn't notice insects on my dog prior to using it, but I haven't found an increase in ticks, fleas or other pests since I started using it, so I am going to assume the collar is working. It is a pretty lime green color. The smell is pretty strong, but it doesn't seem to bother my dog. I do take it off when we go up to bed at night because I like to have a break from it. It attaches securely and easily and I would buy it again and would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: A. Durnell

customer_reviews.title: Good flea/tick collar.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. 👍 We've had it on our dog for two weeks. She walks through the woods, high grass and bushes daily and we haven't found any ticks. It does have a scent, but it's pleasant smelling. Definitely diminishes within a couple of days out of the box. She doesn't seem to mind the collar. Will definitely buy again. Good alternative to the flea and tick skin treatments. A+
customer_reviews.author: KKAR

customer_reviews.title: Safe alternative for fleas and ticks
customer_reviews.text: I worked for A Vet for 15 years and I would never put the poisons on my dog that they sell. This collar works great and is very cute on. No fleas, no ticks and I live near a lake. Leave it out overnight if you think it smells too strong but I like the fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Makeupcat

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the investment!
customer_reviews.text: I first considered this product when we got our puppy a few months ago. He was too young for any "traditional" flea and tick medications, so I took a chance on this product. What a great purchase it was! It has kept the fleas and ticks away so well that we bought a second collar for our eight-year old English Springer Spaniel. Now, I will never use any chemical products on my dogs again. Thank you for making a wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Karslake

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service...
customer_reviews.text: These would have worked fine however they were just slightly too big for my really small dog. This company seems to be very much focused on ALL-NATURAL products that are good for your pets. Even though the collars did not work out I am currently using one of their ALL-NATURAL shampoos and conditioners for my little guy. This company has great customer service and wants to offer the best products, so I am giving them an updated review of 5 stars. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: H. R.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this collar in the spring for our two westies who had sensitivity issues with other flea control methods (both pills and topical). Like other comments, I found ticks on their beds and in our car after walks, but have never had a tick, or fleas, on our dogs this entire summer. I would have ticks embed on our dogs using Frontline all the time----these collars seem to make ticks completely uninterested in our dogs. It's an amazing product, and my dogs are no longer getting sick from flea & tick prevention!
customer_reviews.author: JMS

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PRODUCT FOR OUR PET
customer_reviews.text: Initially I agree with others that scent is strong. After a week or so it dissipated; chemical collars also have strong smells so since she is wearing I prefer natural. She doesn't spend a lot of time outdoors, so I can't guarantee effectiveness, but she does walk around our yard a few times each day. Added bonus is I used leftover piece of collar (as suggested) in closet to repel moths, etc.
customer_reviews.author: SHOPPIN MOMMA

customer_reviews.title: If I could, would give zero stars!
customer_reviews.text: On the second day of use my dog came inside from playing on our yard with 2 ticks on him, 7 days after he had 4 ticks!!! If you love your pet do NOT buy this product, the scent is super strong that I had to take it out because my dog was having a hard time breathing and plus it doesn't prevent from ticks and it looks ugly with that thick green color too!
customer_reviews.author: marisachris

customer_reviews.title: Don't know if it works
customer_reviews.text: Don't know if it works because I had to take the collar off, the smell was just overwhelming! She's mostly a inside dog, so I couldn't stand the smell, like others have mentioned it reeks! Put it in a zip lock bag, not sure if I'll even use it when I take her out, because even when she comes back in without the collar on she smells...from wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Zemo

customer_reviews.title: Item was non-conforming and had to be returned
customer_reviews.text: The collar received did not look like the first collar I had ordered some months ago, nor did it look like the one pictured on the website from which I ordered. The collar I received was also green and plastic and strong-smelling but did not have perforations through the collar and did not have a clasp that worked. There was a kind of buckle that one threaded the end of the collar into, but no way to keep it closed. I returned it. I ordered another which was received yesterday and it looks like the first one. I am letting it air out before I put it on my dog and I hope this one works.
customer_reviews.author: Marie96

customer_reviews.title: unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: Did not want to use harsh chemicals on my little Teddy, so was very happy to find a natural product. The odor was gone after 24 hours so that was a positive . Have lived here for 12 years and our dogs have never had a flea until this year even though they roam our huge yard When the collar did not work after a few days, thought it may take a week or so ... It has been almost a month and he still has fleas. Have tried everything. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bre

customer_reviews.title: What a great collar and not to mention how long it lasts
customer_reviews.text: What a great collar and not to mention how long it lasts. For the price it's a definite buy. Also great to know if your dog eats it, its safe as our dog somehow got her collar off and ate part of it.
customer_reviews.author: Makana's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!!!
customer_reviews.text: These do not work for my dogs, I bought 4 (total of $120) of them for a year supply for my 2 dogs... they have been wearing them for 3 weeks and ever day I am pulling handfuls of ticks off of them... some embedded right under or near the collar. I am aware this collar does not kill the ticks, but it surely does not repel them either!!! Since some of the ticks were engorged, I feel it necessary to now have my dogs tested for lyme! I will be sending these back and ordering the seresto collar! Don't waste your money!!!
customer_reviews.author: CountryGirl

customer_reviews.title: The smell is rediculious!
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute worst item that I have ever purchased on Amazon! The smell is overbearing to say the least. I even let it set outside (in good weather no rain) for two days to hopefully reduce the odor. My dog actually gagged when I put it on him and my eyes started to water. Removed it, we were both back to normal in a few minutes and promptly returned it for a refund. Pay the extra $$ for a brand name!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Shank

customer_reviews.title: Great for my home with 4 kids!
customer_reviews.text: This year has been terrible for ticks. Both my boys and myself were bit, and there were three on our dog! But after we got the collar they left our dog alone. I need something like this for the kids!. It is so great knowing that this is safe so my little children can still hug our dog.
customer_reviews.author: Jellybean

customer_reviews.title: Definite buy!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! My dogs were flee ridden to say the least, I live in the valley and sure enough when it started getting warmer the bugs came out in full force. I have a border collie and chihuahua, both were covered in flees. Tried the advantage drops which didn't work. So I shaved the border collie, washed both of them and got rid of ALL fleas, then put these collars on. Haven't fleas had any since (been 2 months). People who complain about the smell are dramatic...they smell exactly like mosquito repellant candles and it's really only strong smelling for about a week. After that they only smell if the dogs faces are right up in yours. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... first but not a chemical smell so it was fine. Had one tick about 4 days after starting ...
customer_reviews.text: Been using the collar for almost month The smell was strong at first but not a chemical smell so it was fine. Had one tick about 4 days after starting it but was attached way down the body at the end of his ribs. He has short hair so they usually embed in the scruff of the neck none since then. Put the trim off section onto the old collar working great again.
customer_reviews.author: MeG

customer_reviews.title: Went straight into the trash! Waste of money!!!
customer_reviews.text: I opened up the packet and was overwhelmed by the smell of Citronella. Dogs can smell 10,000 x what we can smell. There was absolutely no way I was going to put this overpowering smell of Citronella on my dog...even if I had put it on, because the smell was so bad... There’s no way I would even want my dog near me...which of course is impractical. This item went straight in the trash!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Consumer Chick

customer_reviews.title: DOESNT work at all, and very strong smell
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because reviews were good. But, unfortunately it didn’t work for us at all. We have a two year old dog that we’ve always bought the cheaper collars for and literally NEVER had fleas or ticks. But since buying this a month ago we’ve found ticks and now we have fleas on him and in house because of it. I gave it a chance and wish I hadn’t, now I’m past my return window. Very unhappy with this. I’ll stick with the cheap ones. Don’t waste money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B

customer_reviews.title: Did not work.
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, great concept, didn't work. My westie mix has flea allergy dermatitis and I refuse to use pesticides on her. We are always battling one new flea every 1-3 days. Collar isn't doing a thing, flea runs right by the collar. Even a couple days after purchase and wearing. Fleas aren't even a little bit annoyed.
customer_reviews.author: SheFishes

customer_reviews.title: I found ticks, and guess where they were hiding ...
customer_reviews.text: I found ticks, and guess where they were hiding? Literally right under this collar. It does absolutely nothing to repel them, and neither does the cream.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Mccafferty

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these, they didn't do anything for either dog. I swear the collars might be attracting fleas at this point. So they're coming off and we're going back to the gross stuff on the back that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: I put this on my standard poodle on April 1st ...
customer_reviews.text: I put this on my standard poodle on April 1st, on June 4th found a tick attached to his nose, five days later found attached ticks on his ears which are floppy and right next to his collar, product does not repel ticks!!! Now I have to get him tested for Lyme!
customer_reviews.author: Linedanci

customer_reviews.title: My poor dog was completely infested with fleas
customer_reviews.text: This product didn't work at all. My poor dog was completely infested with fleas. I gave him a bath, sprayed him down with a flea repellant, completely cleaned my home, washed everything he touches, and put this collar on him. The very next day I found a flea on him and now after 4 days I've had to go through the process all over again. DOn't waste your money on this ineffective product.
customer_reviews.author: Fharen

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog puke
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if my dog is allergic to an ingredient or what but after wearing this collar for just a few hours she's been nauseous and has been vomiting. After puking up her entire dinner, she woke in the middle of the night vomiting again. Washed her neck where the collar was and she seems to be doing a bit better.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Spock

customer_reviews.title: Even after bathing my dog in their suggested shampoo regularly ...
customer_reviews.text: Even after bathing my dog in their suggested shampoo regularly and flea pills this collar did nothing to repel anything especially fleas. It was unfortunately a waist of money.
customer_reviews.author: M Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: My dog has had this collar on for about 5 days. Today, I found a tick on her neck- next to the collar, so obviously it is not working. It does have a nice smell and I like the way it is designed, but I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica S.

customer_reviews.title: Arava Flea & Tick Prevention Collar
customer_reviews.text: Arava Flea & Tick Prevention Collar... I found a tick two weeks after putting the collar on my dog, it was swollen up Grey and looking like it had been on her for a week. Need I say any more...
customer_reviews.author: instinct

customer_reviews.title: I was doubtful, but was pleased with it for my elderly pug
customer_reviews.text: I am reluctant to expose my elderly pug to anti-flea and tick products due to her age. I decided to try this product to help reduce her exposure to insects in the yard. It appeared to work quite well. She did not have any fleas, and I check her regularly. I would happily buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer - no fleas or ticks on my dog :)
customer_reviews.text: I liked the collar enough to purchase a 2nd one, once the original smell wore off. It’s a bit strong of a smell at first, but pleasant, and it seems to work well. No issues with fleas and ticks on my dog, even though we are in wooded areas of Central TX. Pleased with the product, and will continue to purchase as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Pinky65

customer_reviews.title: Great Natural Solution
customer_reviews.text: I have two small dogs that I use this collar on. I have tried other “natural collars”, some without much luck. So far I really like this flea collar. I let it air out the first day out of the package before I put it on my dogs, and then the scent is just fine. I find it very easy to pop on and off when I bathe them and I am happy that I am not using chemicals on them.
customer_reviews.author: suzibaker

customer_reviews.title: Have purchased before and just received a new collar, it was covered in weird crystals and fibers
customer_reviews.text: I will not purchase this again. I had purchased previously and used in conjunction with herbal sprays from another company. Still my dog would have ticks attached, even under the collar but it was better than nothing. I really wanted it to work. I tried again recently and the collar I received was a washed out color compared to the others, it was covered in a hairy, crystallized fiber residue. Not something I would put on my dog. Returned for a refund and I’m on the hunt for another all natural collar.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne S.

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Work For Our Dog
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this and used it in combination with their flea shampoo. The flea shampoo works super well! I literally watched the fleas die in the shower and back out of her fur. However, this review isn't about their shampoo. This collar was on for a couple of months and fleas did not hesitate to run around on her and feed off of her. I don't believe this product is effective and I vacuumed our home thoroughly every couple of days, washed bedding, and used Diatomaceous Earth on rugs and such, and even put some in our shop vac for any hatching fleas so it's not like I didn't treat for fleas appropriately.
customer_reviews.author: JV

customer_reviews.title: Works for us!
customer_reviews.text: We switched from Seresto to this collar because my dogs were having skin issues. I wasn't sure how effective it would be, so I couples it with an all natural spray which was applied when the dogs would be outside more than usual. I am pleasantly surprised with this products. Both dogs have been free of fleas and ticks for a past few months. I do not know how well it works in heavily tick infested areas on its own, but in conjunction with a spray, it's a much safer alternative to a topical or ingestible product from the vet.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Kim

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love
customer_reviews.text: This is an AMAZING product. My mom (who doesn't have the time or patience to venture beyond her local pet stores) tasked me with the responsibility of finding her beloved shih tzu a flea collar online. After hours of research, this product seemed to strike the best balance of all the qualities I was looking for. It's all natural, safe, AND effective. Not to mention, my mom loves it! Go ahead, try Arava's Flea and Tick Control Collar! Your pup will thank you for it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The smell was very intense when I opened the package. I had to air it out for a day before I put it on my dog. It was a nice idea to make it safe for pets and children, but unfortunately it didn't work. My poor dog is still covered in fleas.
customer_reviews.author: Rekka

customer_reviews.title: I have only had this flea collar for a little ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this flea collar for a little over a week but so far it seems to be working fine
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Williams

customer_reviews.title: it's nice and clean
customer_reviews.text: I made the choice to go natural with my corgi. He has had so many skin issues. He's only been wearing it a few weeks but so far no ticks and no fleas! I don't mind the mild smell either, it's nice and clean. The ticks are real bad in eastern mass so we'll see how it works a month or so down the road. I may have to Get an additional one for him to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri G

customer_reviews.title: Collar is smooth, attractive & smells pleasant
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with natural flea/tick collar. Collar is smooth, attractive, smells pleasant. Honey wall bounced for a few minutes when we put it on her, but then she was fine. No-one had adverse affects; all natural ingredients great for Honey & us.
customer_reviews.author: nz

customer_reviews.title: ... dog - within two days of using it our sweet angel had fleas
customer_reviews.text: I am sorry to say this product did not work for our dog - within two days of using it our sweet angel had fleas. I have owned dogs for 20 years and this is the first time any of my dogs has had fleas - I was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Geminijem

customer_reviews.title: Does not deter fleas
customer_reviews.text: This collar smells fabulous. Keeps my house smelling wonderful. Does it repel fleas? Not so much. I used Cedarcide to kill the fleas on my Belle. If I miss one, it multiplies into dozens in no time. I bathe her in flea shampoo. One trip outside and soon she is covered again. The collar was no deterrent at all. I am getting nematodes for the yard. I did that a few years ago. This is the first year since then that I have had a flea issue. I am totally against any kind of chemical on me or my dog. I was disappointed the herbal collar didn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: N. Hall

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love it...
customer_reviews.text: I’d like to think that the one flea I found on my dog might have had many hijacking little buddies if not for the collar. But who can say for sure. I have at least not found a tick on the dog since she’s been wearing the collar (for which the collar was granted 3 stars) but I did find a flea. One flea. The jury is, therefore, still out. It is strong smelling, but I didn’t find it offensive. The dog did, though. I’ve left the collar on but have resorted to more...unnatural methods of parasite protection. One flea is one too many for me.
customer_reviews.author: Thunderbird

customer_reviews.title: Worked well at first but didn’t last
customer_reviews.text: If I had a done this review a month after I got this collar, it would have been great! We had no issues at all. Unfortunately, after about 2 months I started finding ticks on the dogs again. I haven’t seen fleas but fleas aren’t really an issue around our house anyways—it was more for ticks. It worked well at first but did not prevent for as long as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poisoned my dog
customer_reviews.text: This product made my dog extremely sick. The next day after I put this on my dog she threw up Multiple times and had extremely bad diarrhea. I thought she maybe had gotten into something. This continued for 6 days And then I started thinking maybe it was the collar because that’s the only thing that’s been different in the past week... the day after I took it off her she stopped throwing up and her diarrhea went away.. I’m very sad because I’m all for the natural products but this was like poison to her
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Dog Absolutely hated the smell
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY wanted this collar to be the "natural answer" to fleas and ticks. I followed the suggestion of leaving the collar out of the packaging for 2-3 days but when I put it on my dog, she did everything possible to get it off her. I had to send it back because she would NOT wear it. And to be quite honest, I wasn't fond of the aroma either.
customer_reviews.author: CLB in Syracuse

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Got for my puppy to help keep fleas and mosquitos off of her, I works AMAZING to keep flying insects off of her like mosquitoes which is why i'm giving it a 2 star and not returning the product. However, it does noting for fleas. Treated the yard and gave her a flea bath before putting the collar on her and as soon as flea control for the yard started to wear off, she was infested again. Package says maximum results from treating pet and environment, but if i keep the environment 100% treated I wouldn't need your product!!!! Strong oder straight out of package that went away after a few hours. I will be buying Seresto next time.
customer_reviews.author: MTank411

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work so far
customer_reviews.text: Early in the season, seems to work so far. Although i thought i ordered "for small dogs" but when arrived noted it was "for all dogs". Have 2 dogs (one weighing round 4-5# & other around 10). When first opened pkg, the collars seemed to be too strong for the little ones. One started coughing & sneezing & the other shortly followed w/a little stomach upset. Took off collars & symptoms disappeared. After letting the collars set a few days didn't have that problem. At this point "seems" to be ok & appears to keep fleas & ticks off. Will follow up review at a later date. Love the smell !!!
customer_reviews.author: PJayCee

customer_reviews.title: Damaged/Expired Product
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these collars before and they worked well and smelled like other natural flea repellents - a mix of essential oils (citronella, geranium, and peppermint standing out the most). This time they were all dried out. The collars were stiff and the oils had...evaporated? They were covered in a white crystalline powder. I had to put them away after I took the picture because the smell was so strong, it was burning my eyes and nose. Returning & shopping elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be effective
customer_reviews.text: After years of using the prescribed edible brands and then the new 8 mo collars I decided to try this b/c it seemed less harmful. Disclaimer; in the last 25 + years of owning dogs, we haven't had any fleas so I was definitely nervous to try this but I did last year and have had no fleas, so I'm trying it again. The smell is quite strong for a few days; I only wish these were for at least 8 months b/c 6 seems like we're cutting it close. I'll update if any adverse incidents occur.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Safe and Effective
customer_reviews.text: I have an Australian Shepherd and we live in the woods. So we have ticks and she has a lot of hair making them hard to find. I do NOT want any dangerous chemicals on the dog because she comes inside and we pet and hug her so that means dangerous chemicals on us! I have purchased this collar three times now because I found it effective. I rarely find a tick and when I do it is usually when the collar needs replaced. The box suggests 6 months but I tend to replace 4-5 months and get good results.
customer_reviews.author: M.Clark

customer_reviews.title: Had my fingers crossed but...
customer_reviews.text: Simply doesn't work. Smell is extreme but I was willing to put up with if if it did what it advertised. I followed all the instructions.. made sure my home, and pet area was flea free.. went for a walk ..fleas came back and now I'm back to square one looking for something else. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer KC

customer_reviews.title: amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product I live in the countryside. We are surrounded by wild animals and have no fences. I have not found any ticks/fleas in my dog, ever. The collar has a strong smell at the beginning but it’s not toxic, just the essential oils. So far, I’ve used it since May, so 5 months of protection against ticks/fleas. Most important, it does not have any chemicals with potential side effects. I have a labradoodle with very shaggy hair.
customer_reviews.author: i rosario

customer_reviews.title: So pleased with the effectiveness of this collar
customer_reviews.text: I am on the 3rd Arava collar and have had great success with its effectiveness. We had been using Frontline (which our dog hated) for years and then moved to an area where Frontline did not work. I then tried Bravecta and while it worked our dog seemed to have a neurological response to it. I then started looking for something natural that worked and didn't have the bad side effects that we had previously experienced. We settled on this collar and have been very pleased. We recently got a puppy and got this collar for her also.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great all natural product! Working well!
customer_reviews.text: My little Maltipoo, Teddy Bear, hates the chewable flea & tick tabs. I hated the exorbitant price. Additionally, I recently read that the chewable meds were not great for dogs. When questioned, a new Vet told me the collars are now much more effective than in the past, so I started looking and I was so happy to find this all natural collar for Teddy. He seems very happy with it as well. He has had it on over a week now and is doing great. The smell was a little strong at first but that’s to be expected. We would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Raz84

customer_reviews.title: Works great for the first 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for the a couple of months but then it stopped working and the scratching began. My dog develops skin allergies (hot spots) when she gets bit by fleas so it's a real indication they're back. For 2 moments no scratching or hotspots. So it doesn't last 5 months as described for my dog anyway. I'll probably buy it as a supplement to other flea meds. Any suggestions?
customer_reviews.author: Princess yaya

customer_reviews.title: No chemicals flea/tick collar
customer_reviews.text: I have a new very large puppy that was getting fleas from the dog park. We had tried a flea treatment from the vet but after reading about all of the bad things in it I didn't want to use it. We tried a natural flea spray but my puppy went crazy and hated it and pouted for 2 days. We order this collar which also has a strong smell for a day or 2 and my puppy hated it Day 1 but after that all good. No fleas or ticks so far and the smell is gone. It also lasts about 5 months so really a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Bug Spray for Dogs
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs our outside most of the day. We give them flea preventative but other bugs like to bother them. We have had these collars on for about a week and the overall itching has gone down quite a bit. This is a great product that doesn't use the harsh chemicals. Think of these as the same as putting bug spray on your dog. Yes, there is a smell associated with it, but it is similar to if you sprayed yourself with bug spray. The company is great to work with, they donate 7% of their profits to animal charities. Overall greatly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: soccer7maniac7

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Hasn’t made a difference in the fleas they have had them on 2 days still have fleas smell is way too strong really hate I wasted my money on 3 of these should have went with seresto
customer_reviews.author: karen waites

customer_reviews.title: Does not work in the country or in tall grass
customer_reviews.text: I have two Standard Poodles who are frequently groomed. I tried these flea collars because they avoided major insecticides and chemicals. Smell was extremely strong clove scent, which the dogs didn't like, but they adapted. But they run in tall grass and the woods and these collars did not prevent a major flea infestation, picked up from digging up ground squirrels. Collars would probably work if the dogs were in town, on mowed grass, and didn't hang out with flea-infested wildlife.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Brehm

customer_reviews.title: My dog and I are allergic to this collar...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, my dog’s allergy to this collar became overwhelming for him when he would itch all day long and even in his sleep. I too became allergic to this collar when I either handled it or when petting him, especially around the neck area. My hands would get these small, itchy, bumps all over, especially in between the fingers. It actually repelled all fleas and ticks. But because of the allergy my dog and I have to this collar, I’m no longer using it.
customer_reviews.author: Gregorious

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it...useless for repelling fleas.
customer_reviews.text: DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!! I started out with Seresta collars for my corgi...which worked the first year, a few years ago...then they stopped working...still saw fleas and constant scratching, so I decided to give this collar a chance. VERY STRONG SMELL and even after 2 weeks of use, fleas everywhere on my dog. My wife and I pulled 3 off this evening and I decided to give him a bath in dawn dish washing liquid because the poor guy couldnt stop scratching. This is a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Nick D. White

customer_reviews.title: All natural is what's most important to me!
customer_reviews.text: I have to be honest, my dog doesn't like this collar... but that's because she doesn't like any kind of fragrance. I personally love this collar because it's non-toxic, it doesn't smell like chemicals (it smells refreshingly like lemongrass which I happen to like) and it keeps the ticks at bay!) Just make sure that you don't let it go much past the time frame that they recommend because we were a few weeks past expiration and we pulled two ticks off my dog. We got her new collar a few days ago and she's been tick free and smelling fresh!
customer_reviews.author: Liz Gurdin

customer_reviews.title: Best all natural flea and tick collar out there!
customer_reviews.text: It's awesome! It smells good and keeps the fur babies tick & flea free! We have English mastiffs who are gentle giants and other collars have not worked because they don't fit their necks. Hands down best all natural products and fantastic customer service.
customer_reviews.author: EdnaKate Ingold

customer_reviews.title: Effective flea and tick prevention
customer_reviews.text: I’m using these collars again this year as I found them to be efficient at keeping ticks and fleas off my dogs. The collar lasted for 5 months, which is great on my budget also. My dogs never liked a liquid treatment applied to their backs but handle this collar well. I’m very happy at the collar being of natural alternatives for pest control. The collar is quite aromatic initially.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Very effective!
customer_reviews.text: Hardly a tick on our German Shepherd since we've put this collar on her, and we walk on beach, through woods every day. I was skeptical but this collar really seems to work very well. And very happy that it's natural. Just bought a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey C.

customer_reviews.title: Great protection without the poison.
customer_reviews.text: I found two ticks on my dog and called the vet. Told me to use this other type of tick collar that had all kinds of bad pesticide poison. I bought the Arava collar and have not seen a tick on him since. This season we have a new pup and did not have her treated. Around May I found a tick on her. I ordered a collar for her and she has not had any since. No fleas all year. There is a strong citronella scent to it but it wears off in a week or two. If you want tick and flea protection without the poison this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Pstox

customer_reviews.title: Excellent collar
customer_reviews.text: We live in Florida so our dogs need flee prevention, for years we did pills and topical treatments; there were always side effects. Arava collars last about three months on our big dogs and are definitely worth it. We highly recommended this collar.
customer_reviews.author: green

customer_reviews.title: I love the way these smell! But I dont think it works well
customer_reviews.text: I have two pugs that cant use topical flea treatments because they have bad reactions. It almost killed one of them. I am very cautious with regards to meds. This is essential oils and I love it. My dogs don't seem to mind the smell, but it doesn't seem to keep the fleas away. They are still scratching all the time and I have picked off a few fleas. I hate to use chemicals, but I think I just wasted $60.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love these collars! My pup has only had 1 tick since using this collar and our yard is full of tall grads and woods. They smell a little strong for the first couple of weeks, but after that it’s fine for us. My friends call it his doggy “cologne” lol. If you are sensitive to smell I would leave it out of the package for a week or so to air out before using it. I leave them on for bath time and that also seems to be fine.
customer_reviews.author: brianna

customer_reviews.title: Smells good, not too strong but didn't work - (other brands didn't work either)
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed...had high hopes after reading reviews...Dog wears it all the time when outside but still has new fleas every day...(He gets flea combed every day). Fleas are right behind his ears - next to the flea collar...I really wish one of the non-toxic flea collars or sprays would work. (We tried 3 sprays and 2 collars so far - none really worked...)
customer_reviews.author: hb

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for non-chemical tick collar.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this collar for about 3 months. It was recommended by a friend. The scent out of the box was pretty strong, but dicipated after a few days and smells nice. It seems to do a good job of keeping ticks at bay. It is not 100%, but we have a lot of ticks in our area. I also use a spray from my vet daily, and the shampoo from this company every 2 weeks. I do notice a big difference in the amount of ticks my dog gets when it comes off. I appreciate the non-chemical element and would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: wd_artist

customer_reviews.title: So while we searched she wanted a solution for fleas because even after bathing the pup and using dawn the poor dog still had some fleas
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our friend who found a stray dog in her yard and was trying to find the owner. We took the dog to the vet but it had no chip. So while we searched she wanted a solution for fleas because even after bathing the pup and using dawn the poor dog still had some fleas. We found this and it has worked. We still bathed the dog a few more times but the collar has helped with maintenance that the dog was flea free after a few days of wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Safe and Effective, with Nice, Non-invasive Scent
customer_reviews.text: I'm so thankful that I found this product. I've used the Arava flea collars and shampoos on all my dogs. We take a walk every morning along country roads but they haven't gotten any fleas since I started to use the shampoo/collar combo. Plus, even my sensitive one doesn't mind the peppermint scent at all. Can't say enough good things about the product and the customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Y. S. Hirose

customer_reviews.title: Good idea in theory, big failure
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work at all. I wanted to give it some time, but I continued finding many fleas on my dog, including many right at and under the collar! I was hoping this would work to refrain of using anything with chemicals. I’m extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Carney

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat the price.
customer_reviews.text: I live in Arkansas and have to say that this probably work as well as the Seresto at half the price. I have only found one ticket near my dogs mouth and that was at the very beginning of having a collar on. Since then I have seen no text or fleas. I will buy it again. The initial essential oil smell is extremely strong but where is off fairly quickly. Doesn’t seem to bother the dog at all, just my husband. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Steph C

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: the smell was a bit strong when i first opened the package and my dog was not too happy with it on....so i let it sit for 2 days to air out and the smell lessened...it is now 2 weeks since i put it on her and there is no odor at all anymore...it does seem to be working fine...i have not found any ticks on her at all...so i am very happy with this collar...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Neat and affective. Veery pleased..  Third collar for Cliff and it does the job.
customer_reviews.text: My dog Cliff has been wearing the Arava collar for months now and it seems to be keeping the ticks away with some success. I am quite pleased with the results and would buy another one for him. He has had three of these collars and they seem to work just fine. We have a lot of ticks on Long Island and I appreciate the protection the collar provides.
customer_reviews.author: cravenusa

customer_reviews.title: Natural and effective!!!
customer_reviews.text: This collar actually works!! I live in a place where my dog is outside a lot, and the ticks are abundant. I have pulled 50 to 100 off of him at once before!!! I don't want to use the chemmy collars and it has been a long time searching for something natural that works. He has had his collar on since February which is tick season here in northern California, and I have not found a single tick on him. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Wagner

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: I have had this flea and tick collar for over a month. We live in the country and go camping, walking etc. and our dog goes with us. He has had no issues with fleas, ticks or itching with this collar. It works very well and I have the peace of mind that I am not putting chemicals into his body nor my home. I highly recommend this collar. The scent is strong at first but it gets weaker as days go on.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: They work for our pets
customer_reviews.text: I am sensitive to scents and although strong at first did not set off my allergies. Gave dogs and cat their baths before using the collars. The collars seem to work. We think our dogs were picking up fleas on their walks. But since the collars we have had no problem with fleas. I like that although seem pricey they last 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Titan the Awesome Aussie Loves Arava
customer_reviews.text: Our Aussie dog Titan is on his second of these flea collars and we love it! I was searching for something non toxic for our boy. He goes two days a week for play at the A To Z Dog Ranch here in Spicewood and they require flea collar or other repellents and I don't like using toxins on him! Thank you for developing something safe for our fur babies!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Seward

customer_reviews.title: This item is way too strong and my dog could ...
customer_reviews.text: This item is way too strong and my dog could not take the smell. Even after leaving it out for a week it was too much for her.
customer_reviews.author: Cherry

product_meta.title: Arava Flea & Tick Prevention Collar - for Dogs & Puppies - Length-25'' - 11 Natural Active Ingredients - Safe for Babies & Pets - Safely Repels Pests - Enhanced Control & Defense - 6 Months Protection
feature_bullets: THE BEST NATURAL FLEA AND TICK PREVENTION FOR DOGS! With the Arava premium natural flea and tick collar for dogs! Our botanical dog and puppy tick collar is here to help keep irritating fleas and annoying ticks away from your dog’s or puppy’s fur. It’s 100% natural and active herbal ingredients and essential oils will add an extra layer of security around your four-legged friend and prevent itchy bites from fleas and ticks. For large, medium and small dogs! THE BEST NATURAL FLEA AND TICK PREVENT

PATENTED MICRO-INJECTION TECHNOLOGY WILL KEEP YOUR DOG SAFE FOR 6 MONTHS! Unlike other low-quality tick and flea collars for dogs, we have utilized a UNIQUE Israeli patented Micro-Injection technology to infuse essential oils into the dog tick collar. As a result, the essential oils will be released via the special pores in the plastic using a Slow-Release process, which will make the natural tick and flea collar’s effect last for more than 6 months!

THE SAFEST FLEA & TICK COLLAR FOR DOGS IS FINALLY HERE! While other cheaply-made tick and flea collars use hazardous ingredients, you can rest assured that the Arava flea and tick control collar contains NATURAL INGREDIENTS ONLY. That’s why our waterproof and adjustable tick collar for dogs isn’t only safe for your furry friend, but also safe for you and your children!

SOOTHING NATURAL SCENT WILL REPEL TICKS & FLEAS FROM YOUR PET! Our waterproof and rainproof natural flea and tick collar for dogs has a light and soothing essential oil scent that will help keep fleas and ticks at bay. These natural essential oils are used in aromatherapy to promote relaxation and prevent diseases, so if you feel like the scent is overwhelming at first, you can leave the collar out for 24-48 hours and then use it on your doggy!

100% NATURAL FLEA & TICK PREVENTION FOR DOGS OR YOUR MONEY BACK! That’s our unconditional guarantee! You can try our eco-friendly and adjustable natural tick collar for dogs for 30 days and if you’re not 100% thrilled, we promise to offer you a prompt and full refund! Plus, we proudly donate a portion of our profits to charities that help protect the rights, welfare and habitats of animals. For more information on our donations program, you can contact us anytime!
